timing_notes: Identical ISA to 68000 but with 8-bit external data bus (vs 16-bit). Word and long operations take additional bus cycles due to 8-bit bus width. 20-bit address bus (1MB vs 16MB). Internal timing identical for register-only operations; memory operations take roughly 2x for word and 4x for long accesses.

instructions.notes: All 235 instructions share ISA with 68000. See m68000_timing.json for base instruction listing. 68008 memory access timings are longer due to 8-bit external bus: word ops add ~4 cycles, long ops add ~12 cycles vs 68000.
